html:
10.11.24  3:50 pm   why isn't the sky orange or purple?

      why would it be

10.11.24  3:14 pm   what's your favorite leaf

      maybe the canada one

10.11.24  12:10 pm   is college worth it if it's free?

      possibly

10.11.24  11:45 am   Remember when a fish got angry at you for delaying its spaghetti consumption?

      no i don't recall that

10.11.24  11:20 am   bill are you here right now

      am i where? nevermind, yes, i am

10.11.24  11:19 am   how would you answer this question? 

      like this

10.11.24  9:44 am   what's your favourite fighter jet 

      just the regular

10.11.24  9:36 am   do you use comic sans?

      only in emergencies

10.11.24  9:16 am   what is the sound of two hands clapping

      *clap*

10.11.24  8:12 am   Can i buffalo a buffalo from buffalo? 

      it might be possible, but you'd probably have to go to the zoo to find a buffalo. even then, the buffalos there probably have an insanely high tolerance, from all the grammar nerds constantly trying to buffalo them

10.11.24  8:04 am   Have you ever had thoughts of sentient chapstick?

      no, but i assume sentient chapstick is thinking about me

10.11.24  7:34 am   Hi bill, i want to ask where do you get inspirations from to make your songs/animations?

     everywhere

      Are there any good songs that you got inspired from?

      inspiration could happen anywhere at any time

10.11.24  3:08 am   im trying to settle a debate with a friend.
are the words oven and furnace synonymous?

      sometimes. possibly in more historic contexts

10.11.24  2:41 am   do i really need to be in class today :(

      i'm not entirely sure

10.11.24  1:32 am   Do you just make up questions to answer or do you just filter questions to what you want to answer? (seeing this question on here will prove the latter)

      i've never made up a question. that's technically impossible to prove, but hopefully i've built up a sufficient track record of pathological honesty on that issue

10.11.24  1:06 am   In a few words, how would you describe your philosophical outlook?

      it's ok

10.10.24  11:43 pm   what should i build in my minecraft world

      how about starting a cult

10.10.24  10:54 pm   How do you look back on older music/projects/videos, do you still enjoy them to a certain extent?

      it depends on my mood

10.10.24  10:50 pm   How to be sad?

      i'm not entirely sure

10.10.24  9:52 pm   I am handsome 

      fair enough

10.10.24  9:23 pm   how do i get good at singing

      this may seem difficult, but you just have to want to do it

10.10.24  9:08 pm   do you have a particular favourite song?

      no

10.10.24  8:53 pm   How small is too small for the mall?

      smaller than the mall

10.10.24  8:49 pm   how does it feel to know that i'm sending this message online to you

      pretty good

10.10.24  8:48 pm   is it just me or is - on the homepage - the s in videos and the s in songs a slightly different shade of grey?

      the 's' at the end of 'songs' is actually white, and the 's' in videos is light grey

10.10.24  7:45 pm   What's a wild experience that you think about often 

      time

10.10.24  6:07 pm   I love the video "perfect" that you made, can we expect more like it to come?

      yes, but with perhaps a slightly higher involvement of musical elements from time to time

10.10.24  5:39 pm   what do you think your style of band direction would be like 

      experienced, after i do it for a while

10.10.24  5:06 pm   What's better
The floor
the ceiling

     due to constant improvements they are constantly getting better than each other

     Speaking of which, what counts as a floor? For some, the floor is its own table, which means the floor is not a floor but a table.

     i'm don't see why that would preclude it from still being a floor. somethings can be both things

     A ceiling is easy, because there is very rarely natural solid ceilings. So what is is a floor

      a platform on which people can safely walk, among other things

10.10.24  4:31 pm   do you like minecraft??

      yes but i don't live in it currently

10.10.24  4:10 pm   Favorite element of the periodic table?

      the.... ground

10.10.24  2:45 pm   If you could remove one color in the whole world, what would it be and why?

      this is off the subject, but if i could remove a task i would remove the task of color-removal

10.10.24  2:07 pm   I don't have a question I just admire your thoughts . i look forward to whatever you produce in the future 👍

      i wonder if you realize how insanely convenient that is for me

10.10.24  1:32 pm   should I make an album just for fun

      sure

10.10.24  1:13 pm   hi bill i just turned eighteen, what is your advice to people turning eighteen.............or any age really idk

      get older ...... if you can

10.10.24  12:11 pm   Have you improved the feng shui in your room?

      around 2011 i did, and it's been great ever since

10.10.24  10:56 am   are you scared

      i'm supposed to be but i keep putting it off

10.10.24  10:32 am   are feelings dumb 

      that's not the way i would describe them

10.10.24  10:07 am   would you consider performing any of your songs (or someone else's) live?

      yes

10.10.24  10:02 am   why did you not explicitly mention 0 in alphabet shuffle? 

      why didn't you mention a different song i didn't mention something in

10.10.24  9:40 am   of all the identity labels, I think "gamer" is the most funny. 

      oh good. in that sense maybe it's usable

10.10.24  9:06 am   do you even respond to uequestions lmao

      it's funny you mention that, because i'm actually doing that right now

10.10.24  7:22 am   Earlier you said the color of a mirror was grey. This is false, mirrors are actually very slightly green. Explain your choice of words

      you explain yours. there's no reason a mirror has to be green. maybe some of them are. the most important feature of a mirror is that its reflectivity is as high as possible, near 100%. but you already know that and that is arguably not the point of your inquiry

10.10.24  6:00 am   hey bill, my tummy hurts. can you tell me your social security number, credit card info & login, and exact geographical coordinates to make me feel better?

      no

10.10.24  5:21 am   I love how unpredictable you are 

      oh good, in that case i won't tell you whether or not i will continue to be unpredictable in the future

10.10.24  3:05 am   may i ask how often you get songs stuck in your head?

      from time to time

10.10.24  2:36 am   what's expert mode? or is it too expert for me to know :(

      it's the original website. before i got the courage to make the fragile attempt to categorize

10.10.24  12:43 am   do you have any peculiar beliefs?

      i believe i only have 1

10.10.24  12:02 am   how many times has this question been asked?

      approaching infinity

10.9.24  9:28 pm   You're so cool and interesting. How did you learn that? Teach me your ways.... Pls

      you've done it too
